DOC.brief_summary: Patients complete study T1249-102 ( must currently fail T-20 contain regimen participate study ) receive T-1249 dose 200mg daily combination background antiretroviral regimen 96 week . Only patient participate study T1249-102 participate study T1249-105 .
DOC.brief_title: A Rollover Study Provide Chronic T-1249 Patients Who Completed Study T1249-102
DOC.criteria: Completion T1249102 ; Currently fail T20 contain regimen Noncompletion T1249102 .
